properties.title: Munot Fortress
properties.abstract: For over 400 years, the landmark of Schaffhausen, the Munot, has been proudly overlooking the town.
properties.description:
The Munot Fortress was built in the 16th century by the inhabitants of Schaffhausen in enforced labour and characterizes the cityscape to this day. The townâ€™s landmark attracts tourists and locals. Enjoy the fantastic views of the Old Town and the Rhine river scenery into the far distance.

Highlight: The Munot keeper lives in a flat in the tower and rings by hand, the famous Munot bell for five minutes, every evening at 9pm, just like in 1589.
properties.name: Schaffhauserland Tourismus
